verbose_text: Compared to control cells, UBA1 depleted endothelial cells displayed a twofold (P < 0.01) increase in endosome-to-plasma membrane recycling of non activated VEGFR2 (XREF_FIG B).
evidence: UBA1-depleted endothelial cells displayed a twofold (P<0.01) increase in endosome-to-plasma membrane recycling of non-activated VEGFR2
